metadata.inclusion:
▶ Add / Remove by the button in the bottom (3rd Button)
▶ Press the 3rd button for above 5 seconds,
- Then, red color LED blinks every 0.5 second 6 times.
- At this time released the button during the red color LED
 blinking.
- Then, ZWAVE Add / Remove operation is started.
- Over 30 seconds, Inclusion/ Exclusion mode is stopped
metadata.exclusion:
▶ Press the 3rd button for above 5 seconds,
- Then, red color LED blinks every 0.5 second 6 times.
- At this time released the button during the red color LED
 blinking.
- Then, ZWAVE Add / Remove operation is started.
- Over 30 seconds, Inclusion/ Exclusion mode is stopped
metadata.reset:
1) Hold the low touch button for 10 seconds.
- Keep holding the button, then at 5 second, red LED of 3rd
 button is blinking 6 times and keep holding10 seconds
 later, red LED of 3rd is blinking 6 times again. In this time
 factory reset will be started if you release the button.
2) After factory reset is done, all the lamps will be turned off
 and all variables will be initialized to default values.

Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
